text:
[Verse]
Neon glow in the night
Streets alive with the lights
Footsteps echoing on
Till the break of dawn

[Verse 2]
Windows shine like stars
Cars rush by in a blur
City hums its sweet song
We keep moving along

[Chorus]
Under city lights
We dance till morning light
Feeling so alive
In the city's vibe

[Verse 3]
Sidewalks buzzing hot
Every corner a new spot
Faces blend in the crowd
Heartbeats thumping loud

[Chorus]
Under city lights
We dance till morning light
Feeling so alive
In the city's vibe

[Bridge]
Skyline kisses the stars
Dreams are never too far
Together we sail
Through this urban tale
title: City Lights
